meanings.definition: A group of alkaloids found in certain plants, used in the treatment of hypertension and mental disorders.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed reserpines to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: Reserpines are natural compounds that can be beneficial for treating high blood pressure.
meanings.sent3: After taking reserpines, I felt like my blood pressure was getting a botanical boost!
meanings.sent4: Herbal remedies containing reserpines are like nature's calming agents for the body.
meanings.sent5: The effects of reserpines on hypertension are as soothing as a gentle breeze on a hot day.
